item.title: Cert Chain for a multi-domain Comondo Positive SSL
item.description: cat AddTrustExternalCARoot.crt COMODORSAAddTrustCA.crt COMODORSADomainValidationSecureServerCA.crt >> cert-chain.pem NOTE: This is the inverse of “Creating an SSL Bundle out of Comodo Positive SSL” which seems valid as well. Not sure if it’s valid in any order.

item.title: Cert Chain for Positive wildcard multi-domain
item.description: Given this list of files given by Comodo Root CA Certificate - AddTrustExternalCARoot.crt Intermediate CA Certificate - USERTrustRSAAddTrustCA.crt Intermediate CA Certificate - SectigoRSADomainValidationSecureServerCA.crt Your PositiveSSL Multi-Domain Certificate - 285695299.crt Do the following: cat 285695299.crt SectigoRSADomainValidationSecureServerCA.crt USERTrustRSAAddTrustCA.crt AddTrustExternalCARoot.crt >> cert-chain.pem
